Welcome to AutoLockToggle!

Immediate screen lock upon power button press usually comes in handy to prevent your phone from going crazy in your pocket. However, when mounted to a bicycle or car phone mount, you might want to turn off the screen and re-enable it without having to unlock while riding a bumpy road.

AutoLockToggle adds a quick settings tile allowing you to quickly change Android's automatic screen lock timer from 0 seconds to minutes and vice versa.

Ready? To use the app, few settings need to be adjusted. The following pages will guide you through the setup.

Open the quick settings menu by sliding down twice from the top of your screen.
